r.s: PHP interface to Amazon Product Advertising API
r.d:
Services_Amazon: * PHP interface to Amazon Product Advertising API * All APIs are supported: Lookup and Search for products, Wishlists, Marketplace, carts, customers, similar item and so on * Provide an associate tag * Multiple locale support: US, UK, DE, JP, FR and CA * Caching support
Services_AmazonECS4: * DEPRECATED: After August 15, 2009, all requests will be denied. * A class using Amazon Associates Web Service 4.0 (Amazon E-Commerce Service 4.0) * Provide associate links * Remote cart support * Multiple locale support: US, UK, DE, JP, FR and CA * Caching support
r.n: Services_Amazon (Amazon.php): * Breaking backward compatibility * Product Advertising API support * New APIs: TagLookup, VehiclePartLookup, VehiclePartSearch, VehicleSearch Services_AmazonECS4 (AmazonECS4.php): * Fixed Bug #13556: Incorrect Operation value for TransactionLookup
